translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Conditions

analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sani dassana ttika kenaci viññeyya duka
translated: The Section on the Triad of the Conditions🔽With-object-of-consciousness-by-some-means-cognizable, the dyad🔽With-object-of-consciousness-by-some-means-cognizable, the dyad

original: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci🔽viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: anidassana sappaṭigham kenaci viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na kenaci  viññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana sappaṭigham kenaci viññeyyam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na kenacid viññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana sa paṭigha

original: kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: kenacid viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na kenacid viññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: hetu paccayā pe anidassana sappaṭigham kenacid viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: nakenaci viññeyyo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: na kenacid viññeyyaḥ ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na kenacid viññeyyaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham kenacid viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na kenacid viññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha
translated: With a non-evident, non-impacting, cognizable by some, phenomenon as condition, a non-evident, non-impacting, cognizable by some, phenomenon arises by way of condition being a root. … six.

original: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyañca anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyañca🔽dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
analyzed: anidassana sappaṭigham kenaci viññeyyam ca anidassana appaṭigham kenaci viññeyyam ca  dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na kenacid viññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a non-evident, impactive, cognizable by some, and a non-evident, non-impacting, cognizable by some,

original: … cha. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe pannarasa …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.🔽Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanakenaci
analyzed: cha saṅkhitta hetuyā aṭṭhārasa ārammaṇe tīṇi pe aññamaññe pannarasa pe avigate aṭṭhārasa  anidassana sappaṭigham kenaci viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na na kenaci
translated: phenomenon as condition, a non-evident, impactive, cognizable by some, phenomenon arises by way of condition being a root. … six. (In brief.) With a root, there are eighteen. With object, there are three. … With mutual, there are fifteen. … With an absence, there are eighteen.

original: viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe tīṇi
analyzed: viññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā aṭṭhārasa ārammaṇe tīṇi
translated: With a non-evident, impactive, cognizable by some, phenomenon as condition, a non-evident, impactive, not cognizable by some, phenomenon arises by way of condition being a root. (In brief.) With a root, there are eighteen. With object, there are three. …

analyzed: pe aññamaññe pannarasa pe avigate aṭṭhārasa
translated: With mutual, there are fifteen. … With an absence, there are eighteen.
